titles: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London in Common-councell assembled: to the Right Honorable the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled. Together with their answers to the said petition.
author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Everard, John.
England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, Printer to the Honorable City of London,
notes: Includes a statement by John Everard regarding a plot to disarm and plunder the city.
Quire B is in two settings; B1r last word is (1) "suspected" or (2) "suspe-".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: London (England) --  History --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
